Uses of Class
bt.torrent.maker.TorrentBuilder

  • Packages that use TorrentBuilder 
    Package Description
    bt.torrent.maker  

    • Uses of TorrentBuilder in bt.torrent.maker

      Methods in bt.torrent.maker that return TorrentBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.addAnnounceGroup(Collection<String> announceGroup) 
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.addFile(Path file)
      Add a file to be included within the torrent
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.addFiles(Path... files) 
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.announce(String announce) 
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.createdBy(String createdBy)
      Set the author of the torrent stored in the created by flag.
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.creationDate(Date creationDate)
      Set the creation date of the torrent.
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.hashingBufferSize(int hashingBufferSize)
      Set the size of the io buffer used for reading from files to verify their digest.
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.maxNumOpenFiles(int maxNumOpenFiles)
      Set the max number of open files during torrent creation.
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.numHashingThreads(int numHashingThreads)
      Set the number of threads used to create sha1 hashes for the torrent being created any value less than 1 will use Java's common fork join pool.
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.pieceSize(int pieceSize)
      Set the piece size of the torrent.
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.privateFlag(boolean isPrivate)
      Set whether this torrent is a private torrent.
      TorrentBuilder TorrentBuilder.rootPath(Path rootPath)
      Set the root path of the torrent
      Constructors in bt.torrent.maker with parameters of type TorrentBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      TorrentMaker(TorrentBuilder torrentBuilder)
      Create a new torrent maker class with the specified torrent builder
